title: How to get someone to help to build my mama's house - Quora

response.answer_text: Hire a contractor… that’s the way most people get folks to build a house. Of if it’s “help build”, hire some laborers. If you’re looking for FREE help - go find a church group or other similar group of people who do such things for people who are worthy. You’d best have a good explanation as to why she needs free assistance.
